==============
atsphinx-bulma
==============

.. bulma-hero::
   :title: Bulma design for Sphinx documentation
   :subtitle: atsphinx-bulma provides Bulma based design and custom components.
   :classes: has-text-centered is-primary is-padding-ml

Overview
========

atsphinx-bulma is Sphinx extension for html-based builder to improve contents by Bulma.

Installation
============

You can install from PyPI by your package manager.

.. code-block:: console

   pip install atsphinx-bulma

.. code-block:: console

   uv add atsphinx-bulma
